name: Animals
description:
"Animals" is a game based on the mechanics of "3-in-row". The essence of Match-3 puzzles is to make groups: lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

A game designed for a children's audience, where the player acts as a farmer. You need to put the same animals, in rows or columns of 3 or more units. Time is allotted for each level: faster you do it - more stars you earn. If you don't handle it on time, the level restarts.

This is a game that develops mindfulness and logic, you can also play with the smallest to teach them how to see lines!

Game Features:
  • Family friendly game
  • 25 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Steam Achivements support
  • Easy to learn gameplay
  • Game makes you think fast
